# n8n_user (Data Source)

Fetches a single n8n user by ID or email. The API accepts both ID and email as identifiers.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `email` (String) User email address. Either `id` or `email` must be specified.
- `id` (String) User identifier. Either `id` or `email` must be specified. Only available for instance owners.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was created
- `first_name` (String) User's first name
- `is_pending` (Boolean) Whether the user finished setting up their account in response to the invitation (false) or not (true)
- `last_name` (String) User's last name
- `role` (String) User's global role (e.g., 'global:owner', 'global:admin', 'global:member')
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was last updated
